Name: Tennessee Iced Tea
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca-Cola or Pepsi)
Instructions: SHAKE first six ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola and serve with straws.
Review: Whiskey and cola with extra interest courtesy of several other spirits and lemon juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Tennessee Iced Tea contains 192 calories
